game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, the fabric of reality is threatened by a mysterious force known as 'The Devourer'. Players take on the role of a gifted Memory Keeper, tasked with unraveling the mysteries of the past and preserving the future. Along the way, they must confront their own dark memories and make difficult choices that will shape the fate of humanity.
game.beginning: In the bustling city of New Eden, the player's journey begins as they receive a cryptic message from an unknown source, leading them to a hidden underground bunker where they discover their latent Memory Keeper abilities.
game.ending: As the player delves deeper into the mysteries of The Devourer, they uncover a shocking truth: the force is not a monster, but a future version of humanity itself, trying to prevent its own extinction. With this knowledge, the player must make a choice that will determine the course of human history: erase their own memories and merge with The Devourer, or preserve their individuality and risk everything for a chance at a brighter future.
